text: 20 em 1 (English translation: 20 in 1) is a video game compilation by Tec Toy that has 20 games. It only came out in Brazil, where it came with later versions of the Master System. ==Gameplay== Many of the games are action games. Other games are racing or sports games where skateboarding, motocross racing, car racing/driving, roller skating or skiing are done. Trophies are earned when games are completed. The text is in Brazilian Portuguese. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1995 video games Category:Master System games Category:Pack-in video games Category:Single-player video games Category:Video games developed in Brazil
title: 20 em 1
